RawLine: SDM_2102004217,好！{color=#ff0000}在這村子裏「五臟六腑同一物，不吃不喝能工作，你會躲雨他不躲。」猜一物。{/color},好！{color=#ff0000}在这村子里「五脏六腑同一物，不吃不喝能工作，你会躲雨他不躲。」猜一物。{/color}

Items.mt: Okay! The village is "the same thing in the heart, not eat and drink can work, you will hide from the rain, he does not hide. Guess one thing.
